code: import axios from'axios';export const searchAPI={performSearch:async(term,startDate,endDate)=>{try{if(!(term!==null&&term!==void 0&&term.trim()))throw new Error('Search term is required');const baseUrl=process.env.REACT_APP_API_BASE_URL||window.location.origin;const url="".concat(baseUrl,"/api/search");const params={term:encodeURIComponent(term.trim())};if(startDate&&!isNaN(new Date(startDate).getTime())){params.startDate=new Date(startDate).toISOString();}if(endDate&&!isNaN(new Date(endDate).getTime())){params.endDate=new Date(endDate).toISOString();}const response=await axios.get(url,{params});return response.data;}catch(error){console.error('Search failed:',error);throw error;}}};
